branchCategory.name: VR

branchItem.name: VR51, Two Hand Control Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Series VR51 is a safety valve for applications where machine operation with two hands is recommended. It conforms to EN574. The operating pressure range is .25 - 1 MPa. </p>
